#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define mx 10010
#define ll long long
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define pi pair<int,int>
#define mp make_pair
int a[mx];

int main()
{
    int f,h,w,t,u;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        cin>>f>>h>>w;
        int mini=10000000,cur=0;
        for(int i=0;i<f;i++){
            cin>>a[i];
        }
        sort(a,a+f);
        for(int i=0;i<f;i++){

            mini=min(mini,a[i]-cur);
            //cout<<a[i]-cur<<endl;
            cur=a[i];
        }
        mini=min(mini,w-cur);
        cout<<h*mini<<endl;
    }
}
